textAfterTable: Prayer Requests If you would like to be remembered in prayer because of a death or serious illness in your immediate family, please contact Chaplain Siri Erickson, Chaplain Brian Konkol, Chaplain Grady St. Dennis, or Kathy Chalhoub in the Chaplains' Office, Old Main 102, x7446. Volunteer Form If you would like to help out with Daily and Sunday Chapel, please fill out the online form or pick up a hard copy in the Chaplains' Office, Old Main 102.
